english.segment1: chorus: baa baa baa baa baa we're lambs. baa baa baa baa baa we're lambs. i'm a lamb- in god's hand- i'm a lamb. he's got a flock of lambs who know him. robbers can not steal 'em from his hand. baa baa baa baa we're lambs
english.segment2: went through the fence, looking for some friends. god saw me scram so he brought me back again. cause i'm a lamb. baa baa baa baa we're lambs. in god's haaand. baa baa we're lambs. you got to follow were he's goin'. god'll take ya in the promised land. baa baa baa baa we're lambs. sing it sheep
english.segment5: tried many moves- tried getting loose. tried petting zoos but i knew they wouldn't do. cause i'm a lamb. baa baa baa baa we're lambs. in god's haaand. baa baa we're lambs. you got to follow were he's goin'. god'll take ya in the promised land. baa baa baa baa we're lambs
english.segment7: baa! we're lambs, baa! we're lambs. baa! we're lambs, baa! we're lambs..
